body:
Hello There, I made a mashup pack of oziliions ocn pack yesterday and i thought i would release it and see what people think.
 I changed all the swords but the bow isnt changed yet so if u wanna download it its down there

http://www.mediafire.com/download/fcehf9lczf5d4yl/Ozian.Minecraft.Resource.Pack+-+Copy.zip
tell me what u think.
P.S i also changed other blocks but i forget what they were : P
